bibl.title: Anticnoe nasledie v iskusstve koptskogo Egipta. Avec résumé en anglais: Classical Images in the Art of Coptic Egypt.
bibl.note: The vitality of classical images can be accounted by their adaptability to the new religious and ideological situation.
bibl.seg: KAKOVKIN A.Ya., Anticnoe nasledie v iskusstve koptskogo Egipta. Avec résumé en anglais: Classical Images in the Art of Coptic Egypt.
The vitality of classical images can be accounted by their adaptability to the new religious and ideological situation.
